pageContext.course_type_long_description: Master the magic of Harry Potter using LEGO®! Visit Diagon Alley, play a game of Quidditch, and duel the evil Lord Voldemort. Hone your magical skills while learning about advanced Muggle (STEM) concepts.
pageContext.course_type_name: Harry Potter Master Engineering using LEGO® Materials
